reference.title: References for Piano Tuning
reference.shortdesc: You may find these references useful for chord progressions and tuning schemes.

section.title: Chord Progressions to Check Tuning
section.p: Move up the chromatic scale and repeat the chord progression. Listen to make sure everything is about equally well-tuned.

section.title: Tuning Schemes
section.p: Tune everything just slightly less than a perfect interval.
Other tuning schemes maximize the sound for a particular key. You can research this further.
